short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NFTs are just Beanie Babies you can't hug.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension replaces all instances of "nft" with "beanie baby" and "Non Fungible Token" with "bb". It is to help remind you that NFTs are just modern-day Beanie Babies: Without intrinsic value but heavily speculated as an asset.

Note that this extension will break any and all links with NFT in it.
